DOC.brief_summary: Pediatric cardiac arrest uncommon critical life-threatening event require effective cardiopulmonary resuscitation ( CPR ) . About 16,000 pediatric cardiac arrest occurs United States annually . Only 8 % patient survive hospital discharge , two-thirds neurological sequela . Majority pediatric cardiac arrest age two poor chance survival versus old child
DOC.criteria: active paramedic voluntary consent pregnancy back pain wrist pain
